TopicTitle: Add a [few] word(s) to the last sentence

Articles.Content:
Ok you just make a sentence with every word starting with the same letter.

You can also have a phrase or another sentence at the end.

You do not have to use any of the same words.

You can start off using a new letter and when you do you can use any amount of words in the sentence or sentences or sentence and phrase (you can also make it be like three or even more words extra normally)

It must make sense.

Examples:

Poster1 Bob Bought Beds.

Poster two:Bob bought Big beds.

Poster three: can't come up with anything so.. Tom teleported tea. Toodaloo (random words at the end after a sentence count as a phrase and in the amount of words)

Next person gets to start.

Edited December 2, 2014 by LABHOUSE
Bill Built Big Bombs
Bill Built Big Blue Bombs
Big Bill built big blue bombs.
Big Bill Badly built big blue bombs
Big Bad Bill Badly built big blue bombs
Big Brother Bill badly built big blue bombs.
Big brother Bill badly build big blue bubble bombs. D-:
Brazen Big Brother Bill badly built big blue bubble bombs.
Brazen Big Brother Bill badly built big blue bubble buster bombs.
Brazen Big Brother Bill badly built big blue bubble bunker buster bombs.

Brazen big brother Billy-Bobke* badly built big blue bubble bunker buster bombs.

*that's my newest cargo pilot.
But brazen big brother Billy-Bobke badly built big blue bubble bunker buster bombs.
But brazen big brother Billy-Bobke badly built big blue bubble bunker buster balloon bombs.
But before brazen big brother Billy-Bobke badly built big blue bubble bunker buster balloon bombs.
But before big brother Billy-Bobke badly built big blue bubble bunker buster balloon bombs, BOOM!
But before big brother Billy-Bobke badly built big blue bubble bunker buster balloon bombs, BOOM! BANG!!!

But before big bad brother Billy badly built big bad blue bomb bunker bursting, bad blue bombs; bad, Big belly button Bob Bought big bad blue beds by best buy. Bye Big brother Bill.

I think adding more than one word would be fine.

Edited December 2, 2014 by LABHOUSE

But before big bad brother Billy badly built big bad blue bomb bunker bursting, bad blue bombs; bad, Big belly button Bob Bought big bad blue beds by best buy. Bye Big brother Bill Benny backstroke bad baths.

It must make sense... at least a little sense and Bye Big brother Bill Benny backstroke bad baths doesn't make sense.

But before big bad brother Bill badly built bad big blue bunker busting (ignore the parenthesis, a big bad blue bunker) big bad blue bombs; Big belly button, big, bad, blue bellied, big but brother bob bought beds by best buy. Bye Bob. Bye Bill. Bob bursted. Backstroking brothers bought Big blue beds by Bob's Big best buy.

I'm all out of Bs, time for a change, I think. (I think that's how the rule works?)

Dan dines daily.
Dan dines during dawn daily.

Demolition Dan destructively died dining daily during dawn.

Edited December 3, 2014 by LABHOUSE
"Demolition Doctor" Dan destructively died dining daily during dawn.
"Demolition Doctor" Dan destructively died dining daily deafiningly during dawn.
